rescuecore2.registry

Class AbstractPropertyFactory<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.registry.AbstractPropertyFactory<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - An enum type that defines the URNs this factory knows about.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardPropertyFactory

    public abstract class AbstractPropertyFactory<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PropertyFactory
    An abstract property factory with helper methods for defining URNs with enums.

      • getKnownPropertyURNsEnum

        protected java.util.EnumSet<T> getKnownPropertyURNsEnum()
        Get an EnumSet containing known property URNs. Default implementation returns EnumSet.allOf(T).
        Returns:
        An EnumSet containing known property URNs.
